channel.title: Do u know the name of this server?
channel.description:
I remember a server (sorry if i have bad English im not english :D) If u logged in u start with Red d hide legs and red wizard top and hat. And a red magic book and D scimmy.
And in the training place u had trolls and black dragons and some women and i think soldiers they always dropped rune. And if u did ::shops u would go to the shops with white knights and they were dancing and there all were shops and stuff. And u had ::skills with woodcutting runecrafing mining with purple ore. CAN SOMEONE PLEASE GIVE THE NAME OF IT ? IT WAS A REALY GOOD SERVER !!!!!
Daniël :D
